subject: PHIL
title: Topics in Philosophy of Science
description: Special topics in the philosophy of science, as announced by the department. Possible topics include (but are not limited to) philosophy of physics, philosophy of biology, the philosophy of social science, topics in the history and philosophy of science, general philosophy of science, and science in society. [Note: This is a repeatable course, subject to different content; it may be completed a total of three times.]
